level.heading: Applications for commemorative works.
level.text: Any sponsor may propose the placement of a commemorative work on public space in the District. Any proposal for a commemorative work on public space in the District shall be accompanied by a completed application to the Committee by a sponsor. The Mayor shall develop a procedure for receiving applications for commemorative works. The Mayor shall publish in the D.C. Register the application procedure, including all information required for the application to be complete.
